conversation.speaker: Boss
conversation.lines: You there! THE SYSTEM IS [shake rate=10 level=20]DOWN[/shake]!

conversation.speaker: Boss
conversation.lines: I need you to FIX IT! I have [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20]VERY IMPORTANT[/rainbow] THINGS TO DO!

conversation.speaker: Boss
conversation.lines: Honestly, what do I even [wave amp=50 freq=2]PAY[/wave] you FOR?
